text:
League 1
OM-OL: Memphis Depay package!
Lyon's Memphis Depay, hit in the thigh last night against Benfica, is out for the shock against Marseille Sunday night according to L'Equipe.
06 Nov 2019, 19:05 by Florian Sermaise



Hard blow for Olympique Lyonnais! The day after his victory against Benfica (3-1), during the fourth day of the Champions League, the Rhone club learned the whereabouts of his Dutch scorer Memphis Depay for the clash against Marseille Sunday night. Released at the break against the Portuguese, the Lyon striker has undergone medical examinations that revealed a hamstring muscle injury of the right thigh, reveals this Wednesday L'Equipe. Its duration of unavailability is not yet known. But the 25-year-old Dutch-born international, who scored 7 goals in 10 Ligue 1 games this season, is expected to do a lot for the Gones' offensive action at the V√©lodrome.




The schedule of OL




Memphis Depay + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

- Ligue 1 - 23/11:
